    public static class CertificationItemBean.ExceptionBean
extends CertificationItemBean.EntitlementBean
    UI bean used to hold information about exceptional entitlement certification.

      • getNewAttributeMap

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Boolean>> getNewAttributeMap()
        Return a structure that contains information about which attribute values are new since the last certification was completed. This is returned as a nested Map structure because the expression language in JSF does not support passing parameters to methods, but does support retrieving values by key from maps. The returned value is a Mapping of attribute name -> Map of attribute value / is value new flag. As an example: 
           Groups ->
             Domain Admins -> true
             Users -> true
   Sandwiches ->
             Ham -> true
             Club -> true

      • getNewPermissionMap

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Boolean>> getNewPermissionMap()
        Return a mapping of target -> right / is right new flag. See javadoc for getNewAttributeMap() for a full description.

      • getIdentityBean

        public sailpoint.web.identity.IdentityDTO getIdentityBean()
                                                   throws GeneralException
        Gets the identity targets by this certification item. This is only relevant in certifications where the item represents an identity rather than an entitlement, such as Account group membership certifications.
        Returns:
        Identity retrieved from the link, or null if not found.
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • getApplicationKey

        public java.lang.String getApplicationKey()
        Description copied from class: CertificationItemBean
        Return a unique key that can identify the application on which this entitlement reside (non-exception items will just return an empty string). This will be put into the DOM as a class name so that we can search for it.
        Overrides:
        getApplicationKey in class CertificationItemBean
